paper.title: Pascal semantics by a combination of denotational semantics and high-level Petri nets
paper.venue: Applications and Theory of Petri Nets

keywords.keyword: Denotational semantics of the Actor model

paper.abstract: This paper describes the formal semantics of a subset of PASCAL, by means of a semantic model based on a combination of denotational semantics and high-level Petri nets. It is our intention that the paper can be used as part of the written material for an introductory course in computer science.
